effect.scarlet-violet: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to raise the user’s Attack one stage.

effect.the-indigo-disk: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to raise the user’s Attack one stage.

short_effect.scarlet-violet: Has a 20% chance to raise the user’s Attack by one stage.

short_effect.the-indigo-disk: Has a 20% chance to raise the user’s Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.scarlet-violet: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. This may also boost the user’s Attack stat.
